content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. As you already know, the apartment is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities. Now, let's negotiate the rental price. How much did you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the central location of the apartment and the proximity to amenities. Regarding the rental price, I'm flexible and open to discussing a fair rate that reflects the value of the property. Could you please provide me with an initial offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I am not one to easily give away my advantage. However, considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I would like to start with an amount of 1,500 euros per month. Let's see if we can work from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your initial offer, Mister Schmidt. While the location is excellent, I believe the price could be more competitive. Would you be willing to consider a lower starting point, say around 1,300 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I am not a person who can be easily swayed. But, since we are in a negotiation, I am willing to drop my initial offer to 1,400 euros per month. Let's see if we can find a common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is admirable. While 1,400 euros is closer to my budget, I would still prefer to pay a bit less. How about 1,350 euros per month? It's a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I appreciate your persistence as well. However, considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I cannot go below 1,400 euros per month. It is already a reasonable offer considering the market value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. The apartment is indeed of high quality and in a great location. Since we are both willing to compromise, I'm prepared to meet you at 1,375 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I am impressed by your negotiation skills. Since we are both willing to compromise, I accept your offer of 1,375 euros per month. I agree to the price of 1,375 euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Mister Schmidt. The apartment will be a great place for me to live. Thank you for your time and effort in negotiating this fair price. I look forward to signing the lease and moving in soon. TERMINATE
